message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you an exclusive deal on this incredible product. I think you'll love it! Would you like to make an offer on it for $12,000?
Thank you for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate the deal, but I'm looking to spend a bit less.  Would you be willing to consider $10,500?  This would be a fair price for both of us.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. This is a one-time offer, and I think it's a fair price considering the value the product will bring to you.

Alice, I understand your perspective, but $12,500 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to go up to $11,000.  This is a fair price that reflects the value of the product and allows us to both be satisfied with the deal.

I appreciate your flexibility, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $13,000. I believe this price reflects the product's true value and the benefits it will bring to you. Let's meet in the middle and make a deal!

Alice, I understand you're trying to get the best price for your product, but I'm still not quite there. I'm willing to go up to $11,500. This is a fair price for both of us, and it allows us to make this deal work. Let's find a solution that benefits us both.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I get a fair price for the product. I'm willing to go down to $12,250. This is the lowest I can go, and I think it's still a great deal for both of us.
